pages.text: The Ritual of Siphon extracts fluids from the world below and deposits them into a tank above. It searches from center outward, draining oceans, lava lakes, or any fluid source.

pages.title: Setup
pages.text: $(bold)Tank:$() Place any fluid container directly above the master ritual stone.$(br2)$(bold)Activation:$() 5,000 LP$(br)$(bold)Per Bucket:$() 50 LP (configurable)$(br)$(bold)Range:$() 32 blocks horizontal, 128 deep (configurable)

pages.title: Behavior
pages.text: $(bold)Search Pattern:$() Starts directly below the ritual, expands outward in rings.$(br2)$(bold)Replacement:$() Extracted fluid blocks are replaced with $(thing)Antilife Block$() by default (configurable).$(br2)$(bold)Indicators:$() Smoke particles appear when the tank is full or no fluid is found.$(br2)$(italic)The earth yields its lifeblood.$()
